data: From where they were on the marble terrace that reached from the palace to a little lake—the Lake of the Golden Coin—Lord Victor Gilfain and Captain Swinton could see the intricate maze of Darpore City’s lights down on the plain, six miles away.
Lake of the Golden Coin | Darpore City
marble terrace | palace | Lake of the Golden Coin | Darpore City | plain

From where they were on the marble terrace that reached from the palace to a little lake--the Lake of the Golden Coin--Lord Victor Gilfain and Captain Swinton could see the intricate maze of Darpore City's lights down on the plain, six miles away.
